amount.description: The amount of items to remove.
amount.markdownDescription: The amount of items to remove.

type.description:
## Consume

---



[Item Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_action_types/consume)

Removes a provided amount of items from the item stack.

Type ID: `origins:consume`




---

### Examples

```json
"item_action": {
    "type": "origins:consume",
    "amount": 1
}
```

This example will "consume" (remove) 1 item from the item stack.
